data.name: String_0
data.value: An evil creature attacks you!

data.name: Mikon_000
data.value: H..hey, you. over there.

data.name: Mikon_001
data.value: You must be a new adventurer, right?

data.name: Mikon_002_A
data.value: I'm glad to hear. Listen up.

data.name: Mikon_002_B_1
data.value: I'm not Vulp- .........

data.name: Mikon_002_B_2
data.value: ..... Maybe I'm the pre-evolution of it....

data.name: Mikon_002_B_3
data.value: Anyways, hear my words...

data.name: Mikon_003
data.value: The world is in danger of being consumed by darkness.

data.name: Mikon_004
data.value: At the point when light is lost, the correspondence will be no more.

data.name: Mikon_005
data.value: Various mons are suspected in belong to the darkness.

data.name: Mikon_006
data.value: Bring wild mons and some apricorns to earn your friendship with company. You are your only hope.

data.name: Mikon_007
data.value: Here, Allow me in bestowing my gifts to you.

data.name: String_1
data.value: The light surrounds you.

data.name: Mikon_008
data.value: By stepping on that magical tile behind me, you can go outside. New adventurer, your quest has begun.

data.name: Mikon_009
data.value: Now go, the world depends on your bravery and courage.

data.name: Mikon_010
data.value: Once you meet the requirements, I look forward to personally congratulating you.

data.name: String_3
data.value: It vanished, Time to continue on. Your forward anticipates your next experience.

data.name: Answer_A
data.value: That's right.

data.name: Answer_B
data.value: Are you a... Vulpix?

data.name: String_4
data.value: It's dangerous to go back down there.
